name: Medication Item wise Sales
query:
select
    mi.item as "Medication Item:Link/Item:220",
	med.name as "Medication:Link/Medication:220",
	si.posting_date as "Sales Date:Date:150",
	sum(sii.amount) as "Total Sales:Currency:150"
from
    `tabMedication` as med left join
    `tabMedication Linked Item` as mi on mi.parent=med.name left join
    `tabSales Invoice Item` as sii on sii.item_code=mi.item left join
    `tabSales Invoice` as si on si.name=sii.parent
where
    med.disabled=0 and
    si.docstatus=1 and
    si.company=%(company)s
group by mi.item, si.posting_date
order by mi.item asc
